channel.title: How do i make the town Edgeville a safe zone in a pvp server
channel.description:
Hey i downloaded a pvp server and its an edgeville based server but i want to make the whole town safe untill you goto the ditch.
Where would i edit this and what cords would i use?

item.title: How do i make the town Edgeville a safe zone in a pvp server
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

in my srver it is || absX >= #### && absX <= ^^^^ && absY >= **** && absY<= @@@@ //(area) <â€“dont need but it helps to orginize

= lowest X coordinate

^^^^ = highest X coordinate

**** = lowest Y coodinate

@@@@ = highest Y coordinate

what yu do is you find the hlowest && highest X && lowest && highest Y coordinate and input them accoding to the key, yu have to go to the area and figure out this on your own.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make the town Edgeville a safe zone in a pvp server

item.title: How do i make the town Edgeville a safe zone in a pvp server
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

Search (Ctrl+F) public boolean nonWild() {
If the code does not exist, add it in with the codes:

[code] public boolean nonWild() {
if ((absX >= X1 && absX <= X2 && absY >= Y1 && absY <= Y2)

        return true;

} else {
return false;
}
}[/code]

X1, X2, Y1, and Y2 should be the corners of the area you want to make Safe. Everywhere in between the corners is also Safe.

Read full topic
